Resolv-conf
===========

**Status: Beta**

A `/etc/resolv.conf` parser crate for rust.

Why?
====

1. There is no bare file parser in the crates.io at the moment
2. I needed one to make dns resolver for [rotor]

[rotor]: http://github.com/tailhook/rotor
